text:
@realDonaldTrump @CNN 60,000 Americans have DIED from #COVID19 in less than 2 months. Over 1 million are infected. Our economy is in the toilet. Unemployment is skyrocketing to 2008 levels. And this  imbecile is f’n watching TV & rage tweeting all day 🙄

#TrumpIsAVirus

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Erin Burnett OutFront
entity.description: Anchored by Erin Burnett, "OutFront" stays ahead of the headlines, providing objective reporting on the day's top issues. The Monday to Friday nightly news program features compelling newsmaker interviews, provides lively debates and offers in-depth analysis of the latest news and global headlines. "I want people to say that our show is smart. I want our show to be authentic," Burnett says. "I want our show to have courage."

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Tonight
entity.description: Veteran journalist Don Lemon anchors an hourlong prime-time show bringing facts, insight and analysis to the day's biggest news stories. There's candid conversations without talking points or spin, and late-breaking news that becomes tomorrow morning's headlines.

entity.name: CNN Tonight
entity.description: Veteran journalist Don Lemon anchors a two-hour prime-time show bringing facts, insight and analysis to the day's biggest news stories. There's candid conversations without talking points or spin, and late-breaking news that becomes tomorrow morning's headlines.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
